content.detailedDescription: Flying bright object, moving at only 20.Mph  moved in big circle among the clouds,circle from up to down "att" distance 1.5 miles,,watched 2 minutes,went back behind clouds didnt come back:
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying bright object, moving at only 20.Mph

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on 309 on a rainy night. i saw object floating next to south bound lane about 30 or 40 ft above the ground turning back and forth.It was near ft.Washington.Was going to stop.X wife started yelling
had to keep driving. seemed to be unnoticed by other cars.
content.summary: Flat black triangle 20 feet thick x 80 feet long hovering and turning shadow of pilot

content.detailedDescription: We at a place call cello wallace center and @9:03pm the their triangler black ship and it broke apart and the scaan the ground and shine its lights on me and my friend  after scanning with white and red  and blue it took off quietly  and the speed of light the next day when walk 120 to 1000 ft it had weird ripples and it look footprints it happen in 2008 and weird foot prints
content.summary: It kind of land beam a light broke scan disspeperaper light speeds

content.detailedDescription: My three brothers and i where outside in a 10 acre field about 9pm when we seen whet we thought was a shooting star but without a trail or tail and one of us said look at that shooting star travailing from east to west beyond the speed of any aircraft,when all the sudden the what seemed to be solid object split into three pieces one continued east to west,one went north and one south all keeping the same speed. they split at impossible speeds and never slowed and each traveled over the trees and out of sight!One of my brothers ran inside scared at what we just saw, all of us agreed that this wasnt a shooting star
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star but then broke up into 3 parts each changing direction directly after separation the flight path of all three made a t path all going in a different direction

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the object catch my eye and almost blind me for a second or two. i turned and watched it go from northwest to southwest over southwest suburbs outside of chicago. i thought for sure it was plane at first, it seemed to change shape, lights  flickered as if it were helicopter or plane but it seemed way too low to be flying over my neighborhood. i got a real good look at it when it was about 3 blocks from me. it had short stubs on the side of object and glided through the air very easy. i thought it was a missile, then someone flying a remote controlled plane but as it got closer i seen it have no wings and looked like a missile and submarine into one. i am sure something can be explained but couldnt seat more than 4 people from what i saw.
content.summary: Missile/cigar shaped craft flying.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking when i noticed a bright star like object enter from the north west. it made a zig zag pattern south to west several times before heading in a southern direction increasing in brightness and reflecting blue white light off the intermittent clouds. after traveling fast rate from north to south it very quickly brightened then faded out to a grayish black oval shape, i could still see the object for about 5 more seconds before it was not visible anymore. i quickly checked the time on my watch which was 12:35:20 am.
content.summary: Star like blue white orb

content.detailedDescription: I and three other observed a series of lights at which we counted 6, three were near 200 feet from us. they raides and lowered through the treeline for alomost an hour flashing. there was no noise and it seemed the animlas and even bugs went silent. this was all taking place in volcano california in the middle of no where. this lasted for almost 2 hours before we decided it was best to go inside and stay inside. these lights would flas almost as if watching a lightbulb tungston light up in slow motion. the only way to best describe what i saw is it was like a shield on a ship from starwars turning on left too right. where the lights were loacted that night were above an open field with only cattle near. we tryed to take film but it could not be picked up on our cameras. this was strange because we were in pitch black and every flas was bright enough too see both my brother and friends faces clearly.
content.summary: I and 2 others observed rising and lowering lights through treeline

content.detailedDescription: Was just looking outside at night time sky and stars, planets.  it was a clear night, no clouds and i could make out several star formations which are normally seen, when i started to notice 4 star like objects were blinking, first one then another.  this kept up quite a few minutes and as i was watching, another object off to the left just shot straight up leaving a tail for an inch or so (white light) then just disappeared. i was happy to see these as i had recently read dr. steven greer's books and watched his dvd and what i saw was very much like what he showed on the dvd and i was thinking...Wow, guess you don't have to be in the mountains in co to see activity if you look for it.  i didn't lose sight of the other 4 star like objects, just got tired of watching and went to bed.
content.summary: Several blinking orbs, about 4 in group, 1 quite  far away just shot straight up and left glowing tail for about a second

content.detailedDescription:
My 33 year old son came in the house sade hay mom ufo,s out side red lights
me my husband went to see i do not remember the date but it was the same night that nubeus the death star was to pass earth so i thought it was from that. but the very bright red lights moving north east didnt seam  natural and not flairs they were not falling they were flying across the sky no sound 7 or more of them people acress the street were out there to watching them to no one could explain them
my housebound has this instrument that measures distance and it side they were 10.000 feet up . we do not beleave in aliens and am shore there is some explanation and would love to no what it was. but now when we joke about them we say they are red not green. i think about it often and it bugs me not knowing 
i looked in the paper since so many people saw them i thought it would be in there but nothing all those lights and not a word wearied this small town everything is in the paper and are paper is really small
content.summary: 6 or more red lights the sae night as nubes pased earth we all thoght they were not,  thay were moving with purpus nabers all sow them moving over the falls lots of them 10.000 fet we used an instrament my housbond has to chack d

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on the front porch having a cigarette. i came to notice the light very quickly, as we have a very wide, unobstructed view over the poway valley from our home in the hills. the light was bright; equivalent to a xenon automobile headlight in the night sky from 2-4 miles away, and changing color in a random (to the best of my knowledge, random) manner. i did not see the structure of an object, just the light emanating from it. i was visiting my parents at the time, and asked my mother to step outside with me to witness this very unique spectacle. she stood with me for ten of the fifteen minutes that i was watching the object.

the object moved swiftly over the town center, about four miles away from the spot where is was witnessed. it rapidly ascended, descended, did loops, sped up to striking high rates of speed, and made swift turns. the light continued to change color and remained at a similar intensity regardless of what direction it was moving. i was awe-struck by the rapidity of the ascensions, as the object would move from approximately 20 feet above the ground (relative to the floor of the valley) to over 1400 feet (relative to sea level, using a known landmark mountain as a reference point) in just a few seconds. there was no sound coming from the object. familiarity with the topography of the valley and a known reference point; black mountain, standing at 1558 feet, were used to calculate approximate distances. the object swept across the valley at speeds of approximately 60 miles per hour, ascending and maneuvering at this maximum speed. there were short periods where the object would dive low and hover, then rapidly ascend to the maximum height from which it was witnessed, +15 degrees over black mountain, which is about ten miles from the home; the home itself stands at about 660 feet above sea level.

my mother stated that she thought the lights (white, pressurized sodium) on the ground over a community park were brighter than normal in comparison to other nights, i disagreed and suggested that we check the next night to see if that was true. we could not reach consensus about the ground lights near the community park, i felt they were about the same intensity the next night. we both agreed that there was some sort of conventional explanation and didn't pursue the issue further. neither of us have been able to determine what it was and we have not seen it again since.

we agreed that the turns and maneuvers were not possible in an airplane or model, and that a model helicopter would not be able to bank or ascend so rapidly like we witnessed. so here i am, just over a year later, wondering exactly what it was we saw that night. i am certain of the date and time, i recorded it for later reporting. i witnessed this event from 2215-2230 and went inside the house after this, as neither of us had the time or energy to pursue an explanation. i hope to know some day what it was that we witnessed over the valley in the night sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Color-changing, low-flying spherical object rapidly ascending, descending, doing aerobatics,

content.detailedDescription:
The witness phoned me on 6/13/2013 and left a message.  i returned the call, and the witness recounted the following, as reconstructed from my sketchy notes:
���i was driving north in hinckley at about 11:00 pm last saturday [june 8, 2013] with my son (10) and daughter (8) in the car also, when i saw a bright light like a star to the north.  it got brighter and dimmer and i could see the colors blue and red.  i drove closer to it, then i handed my phone, which has a camcorder, to my son and turned the car left so my kids could see it.  at that point i lost sight of it, but it must have approached the car very quickly, because my kids said it was over the car.  they were frightened.  [at this point] we were by the park in hinckley.  there���s also an elementary school park; it was not that park.  [i stopped the car] and looked up and it was overhead very close.  it was v-shaped and had an orange-red color like a fluorescent light in the corner.   it would have taken a 65��� tv screen at arm���s length to blot it out.  [the object then moved off and i followed it for four blocks before it was out of sight.]  i later told my mom [and sisters]; they laughed at me; i���m often looking at the sky.  i saw three more of the same thing last night [june 12], with blue and red on top.  i don���t have a computer or internet access.  i asked a friend where i should report this and [s/he] got your name from mufon.  i have a question:  do satellites have colored lights that they can dim and brighten? ���
later in trying to pin down the time more accurately, the witness said the time of the june 13th sighting was between 11:00 and 12:00 midnight.
��� w.I.M. chief investigator
content.summary: V-shaped object with blue, red and orange-red lights approached, hovered over car.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed. i laid down and was looking out the window above my bed and say a brilliant flash of light. it disappeared then a few seconds later i saw the flash again. i got up and looked out the window closer and saw a star like object moving at a high altitude from south to magnetic north. i ran downstairs and out to the front porch and it was directly overhead. the sky was clear and the stars were out. it appeared to be high in the sky. it grew brilliant white again and then it was gone. i went around to the backyard to see if i could find it again but it just wasn't there anymore. it was star sized and when it flashed it grew to the size of a dime. the flash lasted a few seconds each time. i am an amateur astronomer and have never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: Orb light that flashes brilliant white

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the roof terraze with wife and friends,we were layed down watching for satelites (my friend vanesa had never seen one)

we had seen so far, 2 satelites an one shooting star, every body was watching one cardinal point,thereabouts.

 i had the north, my wife was in the middle watching north east, suddenly i noticed the lines of two wings, transparent and mimetised with the stars, it looked like it did not float in the air but all the way around, that thing look like it was moving trough water, flyingo from south (ocean pacific) to north (in land) the wings were kind like the egiptian or roman eagles, like any other wings i ever seen in diferent culture, i pointed a t it for 5 seconds untill my wife could see it, i put my head next to hers so he can follow my finger,she saw it for 3 seconds and the wings disapeared in the next two seconds, i asked her in front of my friend "how did it look like"?
and at the same time we said "long straight wings" drawing the form in the air with our hands.

i was not very happy to see that, it look frightening to me, even if i convince my self that the russians or gringos  (iam an atheist...Or was) have a superior technology than the one we been showed in tv and moovies, even if i stop being and atheist that thing did not look angelical or heavenly, my wife goes to a cristian church and she tought also that did not look friendly.

that thing desapeared easy...1,2,3! 

i think (today) that:

 1) there are things floating at night, or it is easier to watch tem at night than day, and these spcetres are "good" and "bad" trying to do something)
 2)there are other planets watching us.
content.summary: Flying from the ocean to land (south to north) two transparent (mimetised) wings, no central body  in the middle, stars can be seen trough, i pointed it with my finger for 5 seconds and my wife could see it!! gone in the next  4 or five seconds, so lapse

content.detailedDescription: Shot 6/13 the orb. is with flash the other without. ???  no full moon last night.
content.summary: See pictures stopped to take bahai  temple after a ravinia concert see  explanation.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog ,i was just admiring how clear the sky was.When i looked up overtop of my house i saw an grey egg-shaped object at first i thought it was a balloon .Then i saw that it was moving really fast across the sky . by the time i could get my phone out and snap two pictures it was gone . im trying to upload them but my phone is not working right. if anyone else has seen this i would like to know.
content.summary: I was walking my dog looked up overtop pf my house and saw an object i got two pics on my phone and then it was gone.It moved really fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I got up in the middle of the night, i live on the 7th floor i kept my blinds open at night to look at the sky, i been here a year and never seen any thing but stars,  last night or this this morning 06/14/13 i got up to use the bathroom, i notice whhat i thought was a star, it was blinking like a custer of star, but it was to low in the sky for a star. it was hovering over one of those pole for weather or police station i do not know what thay are for, during the day the light flash white and at night thay flash red, so above it was this cluster of lights that didn't move , so i arranged my pillow on the bed to watch it started to move very slow, i could not believe my eyes then a bit faster, and all at once gone, that is my story.
content.summary: Hovering over a weather light, looked like a custer of stars, but it was to low in the sky, mover slow then faster & dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: My friend went outside to "look for ufos" and immediately called me outside and showed me two lights in sky that moved as if intelegently controled and seemed to be stars at first, but because of the movement seemed like spaceships that were very huge and moved outrageously fast and deliberate then dissappearing in an instant. my friend went out the next night telling me he could "feel" them calling him. the lights were there again and doing same thing. i began to go out with him each night for about a week and they never returned after that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My friend spotted two lights in sky that looked like stars but moved almost violently for several nights in a row around same time for about same amount of time (he said he sensed to look there)

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my friend's house on a summer afternoon in the seventies when a chrome colored sphere very high in sky caught my eye by moving stragely for a baloon which is what i thought it was at first. i stopped and observed for about ten minutes until it ascended so high i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Caught my eye while walking, chrome color, seemed large and intelegently controlled

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard having a cigarette and i saw what i thought was a lantern crossing the sky above the roof tops in my suburb gainig altitude and travelleling at some speed. i thought nothing of it. i walked to the other side of my garden and it appeared in the distance over my roof line travelling in a northwards direction gainig altitude and speed away from me and into the darkened clouds then disappearing. i wasn't sure at the time what it was. (bright orange orb). then i seen two more orange orbs following in a similar direction a 30 - 60 seconds between each sighting. the last was closer and seemed brighter but followed the same flight path as the first two. there was no noise i could hear.
i was fixated on them and unfortunetley didn't get any pictures.I just stared at them and was trying to work out what i could be seeing. i dismiss them being a lantern as they were really bright orange and disappeared from view within a minute. also there was hardly any wind. quite a freaky experience as i have never seen anything like this before. hopefully i won't be the only person reporting this as i live in a populated area of melbourne.
this sighting has happened at night, the only feature i could see was the bright orange orbs. the date is the 14/06/2013. sighting ocurred at 10.15pm
content.summary: Three bright orange orbs flying

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in my boyfriend's car driving along waterworks road from the north towards red hill when he noticed a strange glowing object in the sky. i looked and immediately noticed that it was something weird- it didn't appear to be a plane or helicoper, although it looked like it was flying at low helicopter altitude. it was pulsing with bright orange light (no flashing lights like you'd see on an aircraft). and appeared orb shaped. we attempted to follow it, and as we turned off the main road onto windsor rd then down victoria street, it changed direction so that it was ahead of us. we pulled over to the side of the road and then watched as it appeared to gain altitude until it disappeared.
i definitely got an otherworldly vibe from it! this was no ordinary aircraft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange pulsing orb viewed over red hill brisbane

content.detailedDescription:
It was facing the window that has a great view of portland and i saw 8 lights evenly spaced all moving at the same speed.  all the light moved together. none of the went up or down. they all followed together like attached to something very big. they were really far away over portland. looked like jets but no loud booms. this was hidden behind the clouds but the lights shined through the clouds.  i have a view of portland outside and i thought at first it was airplanes but a jet took off.  that portland airport jet looked like a bug next to these lights. i don���t know about aliens from outer space.  i thought of star destroyers when i saw the light because of how far away it seemed and filled up the south sky still. i can see all the way to clackamas hill. the only planes i know that fly in formation are fighter jets. but this was moving so much slower. it was very far away but it seemed to be going 5 miles an hour. a car on the road at that speed would be 5 miles an hour but if this was really far away who knows who speed it was really going. fighter jet also usually are in groups of 2 or 3 this was 8 and the one at the end was alone.  but even fighter jets that far apart can���t be in sync.  it was slowly moving north east but mostly east.. i don���t know what that was but i was somewhat afraid. all i have to say is whatever it is or was be sure to be save just in case it���s the beginning of the end���. 

i drew an image to show what the light pattern was. this was no normal aircraft... i also included the airplane that was taking off so that the size was easily read.
content.summary: Eight lights over portland oregon

content.detailedDescription: While doing some cat fishing from my dock on lake conway, i was in the process of setting one of my poles down on the dock. i was watching my line to make sure it was tight. that's when the horizon caught my view. looking south over the lake, i seem a very thin profile of something in the air. it had a steady burning red light in front and a pulsating red light in rear. it was very low. and ungodly long. i lived by airbase in jacksonville for almost my whole life. i've seen every kind of plane they have. i have never seen anything this long and slender. not sure what it actually is. just thought i should tell someone. but that reminds me. maybe an hour earlier there was so phantom waves. no boats in the area but had really big wake against my dock. not had an experience like that since i was very young where i grew up in pascagoula ms.
content.summary: From my point of view look to be half inch above tree line with arm all the way out using fingers. two n a half inches long. one steady red light at nose. one slow pulsating leeds light at rear. no other lights . really slender side profile.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend wear at the park playing soccer she notice some thing in the sky behind me a flashed of light in the sky  i turned around and there it was right there in front of me about 60 feet away floating slow towards the east it reflected off of of the sun once and then again then 2 to 3 more times after that it look like an orb shape and moved very smooth i could see the glow around it the energy it carried it flashed a reflection off of the sun like if on purpose like it was trying to be seen.My girlfriend turned away with fear and did not want to be apart of this .
content.summary: Silver color it reflected of of the sun about 5 times it was shiny and moving slow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at another location when this happened. i knew i must immediatly post this to mufo and other boards i am a member of. i will gather more information from her about this sighting and will provide her contact info if you contact me back. here is her last message to me....

"it was this morning when the storm rolled in...About 9 or 930. i took a bunch of pics and i never noticed it. i posted it on weatherboy cuz they said post pics of the storm near you. then i went back to look at the pic and danielle said what's up with the ufo. then i saw there was a bunch of people that shared it on ufo sites. so i looked closes. the instagram version i posted makes it much clearer but i posted this one to prove it wasn't the filter."
content.summary: My best friend and coworker sent me this picture taken outside of my work.

content.detailedDescription:
I've been interested in the universe and physics for most of my life. i've spent many nights just gazing at the stars looking for unusual objects. i've seen hundreds of satellites moving slowly across the night sky. i've seen the space station as light reflected off of it from the sun as it moved across the sky. i used to see them more frequently living on a farm in cross plains, texas. now living in the city the lights keep me from seeing such a large number of stars and planets, but on some nights the visibility is good. on several occasions recently i've see what i initially thought was a satellite moving across the sky only to see it make a complete u turn and head the opposite direction and i've seen small dimly lit objects moving in different directions across the night sky changing speeds but nothing i could say for sure it was a ufo. 

last night i was having a hard time sleeping, so at 4:00 am i got up and went out to the front porch, it was a good clear night. when i first stepped outside i look across the street toward the western sky where i frequently see bright planets and stars, but when i looked up this time i immediately saw this very bright circular object, it was a bright as a car head lamp at one block away. it didn't cast a beam, it glowed brightly. i first thought to myself wow that is the brightest planet i've ever seen, not even thinking about ufo's. as i stood there for a few seconds it started moving away from me, so i sort of ran toward the road to get a  better view. as i did this, the light started to dim until all that was left was a round transparent sphere. it looked like a clear glass ball in the sky. as it kept moving away it slowly disappeared out of sight. i actually stood there for a few minutes with my mouth wide open staring at the sky. this was like nothing i've seen before. it was big and bright and made no sound. i didn't see any air traffic around for several minutes. i know the patterns the planes take as they approach the airports or take off. i also see fighter jets as they take off from carswell, they usually fly very high once they get this far. this object was within our atmosphere. hard to tell how high but to guess 5,000 ft or less.  at that height i would guess it was 300 feet in diameter. it emitted its own light, not a reflection.
content.summary: Sphere like object very bright started moving slowly away, the light dimmed leaving outline of sphere, transparent and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling home from the lubbock area after a doctor visit on june 6th, 2013, heading east on hwy 62 moving between floydada in floyd county and matador in motley county just after 10:30 pm. we had stopped in floydada for gas at 10:25 pm. i was driving the speed limit of 75 mph with the cruise control on. 
it was very dark because there was a new moon. my husband, first saw the red lights to the south of the highway. it was a huge field of bright sequentially blinking bright red lights and it was a little ahead of our position. 
my husband said to me "look at all those bright red lights. it doesn't look like any kind of airfield i've ever seen, besides this is floydada. no airfields this large around here." then i looked and commented that i didn't think airfields had rows of bright red blinking lights. then he said "they are blinking sequentially." 
we were only about a few of miles outside floydada heading east. there were about 60 to 100 of these red lights in horizontal rows blinking simultaneously about a mile in length and about tree height above the plains. then suddenly we noticed that we were alongside parallel to the field of red lights, just about in the middle. my husband was telling me excitedly about this as i looked over and saw the same thing. it was parallel with us. 
a few minutes after seeing the red light field become parallel to us, we then saw 6 to 10 bright white vertical lights appear within the red light field flashing upward in sequence. however, the white light "pillars" were not in sinc with the red lights. these vertical white lights continued for several minutes and then vanished.  
since i was driving, my husband kept his eyes on the objects. i was looking as much as possible. the objects traveled parallel with us for about 10 to 15 miles continuously then slowed a bit so we were ahead about a quarter mile or so. then suddenly they were back parallel to us. 
by now we were discussing how we were certain that this was and event like nothing either of us had ever encountered before and that these were something unknown and extraordinary. we were not afraid and did not have any feeling of urgency or anything. i wanted to pull over and watch but my husband was so tired and wanted to continue home. 
then, however, another large object just appeared in front of the red light field. it was a round object, not a sphere but a very large circle or large cylindrical shape, flat on top and bottom, out in front of the field of red lights still blinking simultaneously. the round object had several rows of bright white light panels rotating around it. it appeared to be rotating slowly. this was all totally bazaar!
these followed along parallel to us for another 10 miles or so until we came to the canyons of the cap-rock off the plains where the highway cut into the canyons and blocked the view.
we both think and talk about this almost constantly. it was incredible to see such a thing! we had to tell you about this.
i am an amateur painter and i am attempting to paint the scene. i won't be able to do it justice.
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Other
content.summary: Observed about 60 horizonal red lights in rows blinking simultainiously then 6 to 10  bright white vertical lights flashing upward in sequence from the red light field, later appeared a round object in front with several rows of white lights around it

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my front deck looking west about 10pm central time. immediately i noticed these strange objects in the sky to the west. at first they appeared a mile or so away,really hard to tell but they looked like dim white stars glowing and then they would move at quick speeds and stop,then disappear,then some would reappear and make patterns and then disappear again. after a few mins i had my wife come outside,she saw them,gave me a funny looked and walked back inside. i kept watching for several minutes,all of a sudden one flew from the west straight to the south,several miles,within a split second. i really thought they were birds until i saw that happen. i texted several people and my sister and brother in law showed up. we all observed this event for an hour or 2. about 12ish they left and i went to bed. the very next night it happened again,but since then nothing. i tried recording with my galaxy s3,but you cannot make them out,too dim. hopefully with your equipment you can somehow see them,you can see me pan right and left trying to capture when they appear. note you will see streetlights and the red light is a cellphone tower. i only looked at one vid once,once i uploaded on my pc.You can also see stars flickering,these are not the objects of course. again they appear and move then disappear within a 2 second period. hope you can see them.
content.summary: Looked like birds but glowed in the dark? and had extreme speeds

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this craft a number of time's leaveing the water of canistere resovour, as i drove east on canistere rd at dusk .  i have also seen a number of times black or gray ford f150's with all blacked out window's no plate's,  parked along side of the road at the same  times that do not belong in the area.  i have lived here for 50 yrs and know the basic car's and truck's from our naborhood . we do have picatiny arsenal on rt 15 in oak ridge nj.  that recently built a large sight tower in the same area without reason and also they have built a very large amount of wiring from the main power grid tower going under ground  hard to explain with out looking at them the craft looks like a peramid shape with a rough black texture very very large with red marking lights at the outer edge's i have seen this craft a number of times in the last few yrs as it leaves the resovour i hope this is of help
content.summary: Asent from canistere resovour to jet flight path then disapered

content.detailedDescription: This event happened about 18 years ago, i was 13-14 years old while my buddy was 16 or so. their was an entire community that witnessed it and a video exists with a neighbor but not currently available to me. my friend and i were playing basketball on my driveway when we noticed a translucent string above my house. it was stretched tight from west to east, and about no more than 6-8 feet above my one story house. we got on our roof to see it closer and it was like fishing string, translucent. my friends family came outside to see what we were doing on the roof and we explained the situation to them. they got their video camera and began filming. a neighbor across the street came out and saw the string also and asked where it came from. we explained from atop the roof it appeared to be coming from the beach area (west). he got in his truck and left to search for the origins of the string; by now more neighbors were outside. meanwhile, we noticed the string elevated slightly (about five degrees) east towards a two story christian school behind my backyard (about 50 to 75 yards away). we went to the school and climbed on it's roof to get a better look to see how far the string went east. surprisingly, when we got on the roof of the building we were astonished to find the string shot straight up, angled at about 100 degrees straight up (it was almost perfectly perpendicular to the roof top). we squinted our eyes as best as possible to see how far the string shot up and what it was attached to (a kite or balloon we thought). we noticed high above their existed a hovering dark object, about the size of this letter "o". it was a clear blue day but the object was too high to see much detail. as we stared at it the object a bit longer, maybe 10 minutes or so, we noticed the object ejected another object. the ejected object circled like a satellite around the main object for a few minutes, maybe five. then the ejected object slowly traveled (i want to say north east, maybe east) while the original object remained hovering still, and then it too disappeared. i remember being so shocked at what i was witnessing i completely forgot about the string. i didn't notice if the string disappeared with the hovering objects, or earlier, but it too was no longer to be found. i think this event is unique because i've never heard anyone talk about ufo's and weird physics defying string. i'm hoping others have witnessed something similar to this event. i don't know why i'm barely coming out with this but i guess we had nobody to report it to back then and newspapers would not have taken our story. now, with the internet, and my recent discovery that your organization exists, it just seemed appropriate. ps i'm a math teacher.
content.summary: Weird string!!! a translucent string stretched several miles above community then abruptly bent about 90 degrees up to hovering object high in sky; then object ejected one smaller object ne and string disappeared; ufo disappeared too.

content.detailedDescription:
I wasn't very tired, so i went outside and sat in my driveway just outside my garage door. i was looking to my right, when a bright light in the sky caught my eye. i looked up and saw two glowing objects moving west to east, maybe 1500-2000 feet high. i then saw a third similar object quickly approach the other two, also from the west. the object to my right rapidly accelerated, passed the first unit and took the lead. the three objects then flew in a "v" formation. at this time they were directly overhead. they passed over the house and continued east. as i turned my head back to the west, three more objects, identical to the first three, quickly approached from the west in the same path as the first three, also flying in a "v" formation. i listened for sound closely for sound, and heard nothing. i also could not detect any vapor trail, etc. behind the objects.
when i first saw these objects i said "holy crap," and just watched.
just as the second group of objects were passing overhead, i could hear a prop plane in the distance. i began scanning the sky for it's lights but couldn't see it. i wondered if the pilot saw the same thing i did. 
then, from the east, the plane flew overhead, along the same flight path as the two sets of objects. in my mind, i couldn't see how the pilot could have missed them. the plane i saw was fling slow, maybe 100-140 mph, at approximately the same altitude as the objects i saw. the plane appeared to be black, no wing tip lights, but did have a dimly lit tail light. the plane was a single engine prop and reminded me of a cessna 172 (which i used to fly), but was a little larger. the plane continued west.
in the instant i saw the first two objects, i thought "meteorite." but i immediately realized they weren't because of the color, size and speed of them. next, i thought "ufo" and thought they could have been military test flights or perhaps extra-terrestrial. i wasn't really frightened, but i remained very still as they all passed over.
i wish i had a camera at the time. now, two days later, i'm still thinking of the event, and felt that i needed to tell someone about it.
content.summary: 3 glowing objects flying west to east followed by 3 more, all in a "v" formation
